quote_last: I decided that I wanted a drink of orange squash before I brushed my teeth and got into bed, so I went downstairs to the kitchen. Father was sitting on the sofa watching snooker on the television and drinking whisky. There were tears coming out of his eyes.
title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time
author: Mark Haddon

quote_first: But I couldn't sleep. And I got out of bed at
quote_last: and I felt scared of Mr. Shears so I went downstairs and out of the front door into Chapter Road.
title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-time
author: Mark Haddon

quote_last: I cannot sleep. Ben is upstairs, back in bed, and I am writing this in the kitchen. He thinks I am drinking a cup of cocoa that he has just made for me. He thinks I will come back to bed soon. I will, but first I must write again.
title: Before I Go to Sleep
author: S. J. Watson
